title: Manaslu Circuit Trek
overview: Remote circuit with Larkya La Pass, Tibetan culture, and raw Himalayan scale.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Meet our representatives and trip briefing.

itinerary.title: Explore Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Explore cultural sites and obtain permits.

itinerary.title: Drive to Maccha Khola
itinerary.description: Drive from Kathmandu to Maccha Khola (900 m).

itinerary.title: Trek to Dharamsala
itinerary.description: Trek to Dharamsala/Larkya B. C. (4460 m).

itinerary.title: Trek to Bimtang
itinerary.description: Trek to Bimtang (3720 m). Larkya-la pass day (5160 m).

itinerary.title: Trek to Tal and Drive to Besisahar
itinerary.description: Trek to Tal (1700 m). Drive to Besisahar.
